.
Process to Reinstate Benefits
The table below describes the process to reinstate
38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
benefits.
Stage
Who Is Responsible
Description
1
SSA PSC
Authorizes the reinstatement of benefits on
SSA Form 656
.
2
VA
Informs the payee of the reason for the reinstatement of benefits by locally-generated letter using the letter furnished by SSA as a pattern, and
sends the servicing SSA PSC a copy of the
letter addressed to the beneficiary, and
award.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
